After getting to the second floor hub: I’m not familiar with this code phrase. Who are you?
It has been a long time Agent Adams. I hear you reached the rank of Special Agent. Congrats.
I had that rank once. The badge, the reputation, the magic sword.
But then I saw the corruption. The bribes, the blackmail, the magic sword.
Have you seen the corruption, Agent?
Ah. You’re one of those. Please do not contact me again.
